name: The Flintstones: The Surprise at Dinosaur Peak!
description:
Fred and Barney are searching for their children, Pebbles and Bam-Bam who got lost. When they finally find them, a volcanic eruption blocks their way and so they start going all the way around the mountain to find out why this happened and of course to save their children.

The Surprise at Dinosaur Peak is the second Flintstones-licensed game for the NES. There are two characters you can play with. By pressing the Select button you can change from Fred to Barney and vice versa. Each character has unique abilities that are needed to complete certain parts of each stage. For example Fred can grab the edges of a roof or a hill and climb while Barney can hang from ropes and vines. In terms of weapons Fred has a bat which is stronger and can also be charged for extra power but it takes more time to use. Barney on the other hand has a slingshot and can shoot small rocks for ranged attacks but rather weak. There are also weapons like throwing axes and bowling balls that both can use.

shot.caption: Title screen
Intro
Fred hitting a small dinosaur.
Fred evading rocks.
Barney can stand on a rope for an instant and jump to reach the extra life.
Traps in the first stage
Finding Pebbles and Bam Bam - unfortunately there's a volcanic eruption.
And you have to go all the way around.
The second stage
Hitting the monkey with the throwing axe and evading the coconut by hitting it with the bat.
Barney holding the vines and shooting at the same time.
Riding the currents on the logs.
The first boss fight
This is a bonus stage where you have to beat this guy at hockey to win a prize.
Barney on the third stage
Riding this stone age "train" and hitting a bat.
The second boss - Barney's attacks from a distance work well...
...but Fred shooting the rocks back to this caveman is more funny.
Didn't think it would be that funny.
Guess that's one of the monkeys Mr Slate was talking about.
Meeting Wilma and Betty.
There are so many things that you won't get bored in this game.
Trying to catch a bowling bowl that can be used like a throwing axe altough it's only for ground attacks.
There isn't much difference in the movement outside and inside the water.
Stay still for a moment, won't you.
The big spider boss throwing small webs to Fred.
Fred and the boss dying at the same time.
The seventh stage is so purple and with many ghosts that don't die.
Shooting some weird creature.
A witch is the boss of the seventh stage.
When the witch disappears two bats appear and attack you.
Getting the final gemstone when defeating the boss.
Near the end of the game and the gameplay still has some surprises.
The stage before the sub-final boss battle
Nice dino
I guess it's not joking.
That will show him.
Weird things coming after Barney.
Looks like the big dino is here - maybe I should leave.
Game over
